useCase.name: Get Partial Stats
useCase.trigger: Client initiates the process by sending a request to get_partial_stats.

mainSequence.step: Client sends a request to the Outgoing server to get_partial_stats.
Outgoing server forwards the request to the stats aggregator.
Stats aggregator starts processing the request for get_partial_stats.
Stats aggregator retrieves partial system stats.
Stats aggregator obtains partial system information.
